title: hello fellow brunze
body: 1. Hello rito, firstly I think that there should be a game-mode where you should choose a passive, a look, and abilities of any champs in the game and be broken. a.e. Anivia passive, rengar q, shaco w, sejuani ult stuff like that. So if u use this please gift me Poro Rider Sejuani... I HAVE OPENED FKING TONS OF CASES FOR THIS SKIN AND I AM YET TO GET IT. IM A SEJUANI MAIN AND ITS MY DREAM SKINNNN PLESSSS. MY NAME ON LEG is insidepc. Also can i please have provisionals back I LOVE YOUR GAME OMMMGG but I HAVE FRIEND NAMED JEEF AND HE FLAMES... ANYWAYS I PLAYED MY PROVISIONALS WITH HIM AND HEE FEEDDDDD SOOO HARD ANYWAYS PLEASE CAN I NOT BE BRONZE. rito plz no ban me ily ur game sm but haha its k if u dont give me anything, tons of people might say this all the time. but im special <333333 {{champion:113}}

replies.body: Imagine if vayne had fizz's E... oh god...

This would actually be a hilarious game mode.
But sadly it would never work, due to how the game, animations and assets are designed.
Eh I think that you deserve your rank, but the gamemode is a good idea and so if they do make it they should give you the skin.{{champion:119}}
